elements.name: Customer should be able to add item successfully into basket

steps.name: the customer is on home page
he chooses to add an "Bhuna Spice Pot" to the cart
he should be able to do so with by "//*[@id='item_list']/div[2]/div/div[1]/div/div[3]/a" on the item and adding it to the to cart button
the cart window opens with the item added
